name: Football
details: Football, also called association football or soccer, is a game involving two teams of 11 players who try to maneuver the ball into the other team's goal without using their hands or arms.

name: Cricket
details: Cricket is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of eleven players on a field

name: Dumble
details: Exercise involves engaging in physical activity and increasing the heart rate beyond resting levels.

name: Study

name: Coding
details: Coding skills are used every day by many, many people who aren't full-time software engineers.

name: Gaming
details: Key components of games are goals, rules, challenge, and interaction. Games generally involve mental or physical stimulation, and often both.
